title: Birthdays
questions: - How do you usually celebrate your birthday?
- What was the best birthday present you ever received?
- Do you enjoy receiving gifts or giving them more?
- Do you have a favourite birthday memory?

title: Books
questions: - What is the last book you read?
- Do you have a favourite author or genre?
- How often do you read?
- Which book did you like when you were young?
- Do you like to talk about books with family and friends?

title: Computers
questions: - What type of computer do you use?
- How often do you use your computer?
- Do you prefer laptops or desktop PCs?
- What software or applications do you use the most on your computer?
- Have you ever built your own computer?

title: Daily Routine
questions: - What is your typical morning routine?
- Do you have any daily habits?
- How do you stay organized throughout the day?
- What time do you usually go to bed and wake up?
- How do you like to relax at the end of the day?

title: Education
questions: - What is/was your favourite subject in school?
- Do you enjoy learning new things?
- What was your best school memory?
- Did you have a favourite teacher?
- How do you feel about online learning?

title: Family
questions: - How many siblings do you have?
- Do you have any family traditions?
- Are you similar to any of your family members?
- How often do you see your extended family?
- What is a memorable family event you've experienced?

title: Fashion
questions: - How would you describe your fashion style?
- Do you like to follow the latest fashion trends?
- Do you have a favourite piece of clothing?
- Do you enjoy shopping for clothes?
- Are there any fashion designers you admire?

title: Food
questions: - What is your favourite dish?
- Do you enjoy cooking?
- Are there any foods you dislike?
- What is a traditional dish from your country?
- Do you have a healthy diet?

title: Friends
questions: - How do you make new friends?
- What qualities are important for you in a friend?
- Do you prefer having a few close friends or many less close friendships?
- How do you like to spend time with your friends?
- Have you ever made friends through social media?

title: Games
questions: - What kind of video games do you like?
- Which games are you best at?
- Do you enjoy playing games online?
- Do you play games to reduce stress?
- Did you play games when you were a child?

title: Hobbies
questions: - What do you like to do in your free time?
- When was the last time you started a new hobby?
- How did you discover your favourite hobby?
- How often do you engage in your favourite hobby?
- Are there any new hobbies you'd like to try?

title: Hometown
questions: - Where is your hometown?
- What is your hometown like?
- Is your hometown a good place to live?
- What is the oldest place in your hometown?
- What is the local food like in your hometown?
- Is your hometown a good place to raise children?

title: Money
questions: - Are you good at saving money?
- Do you want to have a lot of money?
- What is the next thing you want to buy?
- Do you prefer to spend or save money?
- What kinds of things did you buy when you were younger?

title: Movies
questions: - What was the last movie you watched?
- Do you have a favourite movie?
- Are you interested in all types of movies?
- Who is your favourite actor or actress?
- What is a movie you can watch over and over again?

title: Music
questions: - What genre of music do you enjoy?
- Do you play any musical instruments?
- Who is your favourite music artist?
- Have you ever been to a music concert?
- How does music make you feel?

title: Pets
questions: - Do you have any pets?
- What is your favourite type of pet?
- How did you choose your pet's name?
- Do you enjoy the process of taking care of a pet?
- Do you think having pets can make us happy?

title: Shopping
questions: - Where do you usually go shopping?
- Do you enjoy shopping for clothes or accessories?
- Do you prefer to shop online or in-store?
- What is the last thing you bought?
- Do you like to go shopping with other people or by yourself?
- Is there something you always buy when you go shopping?

title: Social Media
questions: - Which social media platforms do you use?
- How often do you check your social media accounts?
- Do you think social media has more positive or negative effects?
- Have you ever taken a break from social media?
- What type of content do you enjoy sharing on social media?

title: Sports
questions: - Are you a fan of any particular sport?
- Have you ever played any sports?
- Do you prefer watching sports or playing them?
- What is your favourite sports team?
- Have you attended any live sports events?

title: Study
questions: - What do you study?
- Where do/did you go to school?
- What subjects do you enjoy most at school?
- Did you have a favourite teacher at school?
- Do you prefer studying alone or in a group?
- Do you have a favourite study location or environment?

title: Technology
questions: - What is your favourite technological device?
- How do you use technology in your daily life?
- Are you interested in the latest technology?
- Do you think technology has more advantages or disadvantages?
- How comfortable are you with using new technologies?

title: Transportation
questions: - How do you usually commute to work or school?
- Do you prefer taking a train or going by car?
- Have you ever taken a long road trip?
- Is there a type of transportation you dislike?
- What do you think of the transportation system in your local area?

title: Travel
questions: - How often do you visit new places?
- What is your favourite travel destination?
- Do you prefer beach vacations or city trips?
- How do you plan your trips?
- What was your most memorable travel experience?

title: TV
questions: - Do you have a favourite TV show?
- What genre of TV shows do you enjoy?
- Who is your favourite actor or actress in a TV show?
- What is the last TV series you watched?
- Have you ever watched a TV series from start to finish?

title: Weather
questions: - What is your favourite type of weather?
- How does the weather affect your mood?
- Do you prefer hot or cold weather?
- Have you ever experienced extreme weather conditions?
- What activities do you like to do on a rainy day?

title: Weddings
questions: - Why do people want to hold weddings?
- Have you ever been to a wedding?
- Do you enjoy attending weddings?
- Do you think weddings are expensive?
- Should people bring gifts to weddings?
- How many guests attend weddings in your country?

title: Work
questions: - What is your job?
- Where do you work?
- What do you enjoy most about your work?
- What are your responsibilities at work?
- What is the most difficult part of your job?
- Do you have a good relationship with your colleagues?
